availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander A. Flint (Graves County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Ann Flint. Married to Ann A. Graham Flint. Father of Ben Franklin Flint, John T. Flint, Henry Flint, Bury Flint, and Lucy Flint. Farmer in Graves County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, District 2, p. 376. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 74. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Haynes, p. 8. Find A Grave, "Alexander A Flint (1827-1902)," Memorial #151873045, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/151873045/alexander-a-flint (accessed June 13, 2017).
